name: London Museums Quiz | World Sites | 10 Questions

questions.text: What does the V and A stand for?
The Science Museum is associated with which academic institution?
What is the Wallace Collection primarily comprised of?
Where are royal wedding dresses exhibited?
Which former royal residence, up river from central London, was built by Cardinal Wolsey in the reign of Henry VIII?
questions.explanation:
Hampton Court.

	Hampton Court was built by Wolsey for his own use, but taken by Henry VIII.

questions.text: A prize exhibit in the British Museum is the 'Elgin Marbles'. Where did they originate?
Where is the Museum of London?
Which public institution has its museum at Covent Garden?
Which German-born writer and political thinker has a memorial library in Clerkenwell and is buried in Highgate?
